## <img src="../nestjs.png" width = "50"> NestJS

1. NestJS requires Node.js 16.x or higher.<br>
   Node Installation Shortcuts. [Node.js â†’](https://nodejs.org/en/)

2. install the depencensies<br>

   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

3. configure the NestJS server

   ```bash
   npm i -g @nestjs/cli
   ```

4. run nestjs

   ```bash
   npm run start
   ```
